main event: Several witnesses in Troy, New Hampshire observed a bright object moving up and down and sideways in the sky on 5 May 1962.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as very bright, possibly resembling Venus, The object changed in brightness but did not pulsate, The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes before the object disappeared, One witness noted that he saw the object multiple times over several nights, The report suggests that the object may have been misidentified as a UFO due to atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: A witness saw the object with his mother and two sisters; another witness observed it along with family.
